entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -20.2°C

Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 67 %

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 21.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this morning then clearing. Local blowing snow this morning. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature steady near minus 21. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 08:09 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 08:09 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023
